feed.title: Category: Startup | Personal blog of Quentin Rousseau

entry.title: Onefeat Startup experience | Let’s go !
entry.content:
Introduction

I postulate to a job few months ago via a Korben retweet http://remixjobs.com/emploi/Developpement/URGENT-Developpeur-iOS-et-ou-Ruby-Fun-social-gaming-H-F/12950

The job was very attractive and the concept amazing. It’s talking about turn your life into an adventure by uploading pictures to complete some missions.

And now ?

After a 6 months accelelaror program in Paris (Le Camping) and 3 months in San Francisco (I/O Ventures), they’re back in Paris.

I joined the team as « Software Development Guy » since this week and we’re preparing some new features for you ! Be patient! />

Check out the specials missions and win a electric guitar and some free spotify subscriptions : http://onefeat.com/specials/sfrliveconcerts

Check out the onefeat blog : http://blog.onefeat.com

Follow @onefeat

More…

  • Onefeat – Play life. Level up.
  • [La Start-Up française de la Semaine] : OneFeat
